442210.description:
ğŸš—Â All kinds of vehicles in all kinds of environments

Use more than 1300 realistic drivable vehicles, of all kinds, to get across challenging environments. The vehicles all have different properties and can get damaged, run out of fuel, get stuck, etc.Â You'll need to change them often - and can upgrade them, too.

ğŸ‘¾ A failed science experiment that takes you to the future

In a teleportation experiment gone wrong, dimensional rifts opened. Suddenly, you find yourself chased by interdimensional time-whales.

Drive through the rifts andÂ advance forward in time. In the year 2055 there is a special vehicle that will save you and all of humankind.Â The only problem?Â It is 1950 now!

Luckily you posses experimental teleportation technology that lets you store up to 3 vehicles on you, so you can switch between them at any moment on your journey, as you encounter various environments and obstacles.

Can you make it far enough into the future and save humankind?

ğŸ•¹ï¸ Replayability is key

A typical Switchcars run takes about 10 minutes. Every run is different and as you get better you'll unlock new environments, years, and vehicles. The game features 100 environment lane types, all procedurally arranged.

ğŸ’› Switchcars was born fromÂ a passion for vehicles

  • Over 1300 detailed and realistic vehicles, spanning years 1950-2055

  • Cars, bicycles, buses, trucks, trains, ships, planes, spacecraft, construction vehicles -Â you name it

  • 40 powerups and upgrades that can be stacked onÂ all vehicles

  • Made by a single dev in the span of 8 years

ğŸ› ï¸ Editor and mods

  • Switchcars includes an in-game editor, where you canÂ create your own vehicles and props

  • The community has created over 2000 additional vehicles and props, so far. Check them out on our Discord server!
